definition: To exist and experience events, actions, or situations in real-time, typically referring to the state of being present and actively participating in ongoing activities. This term is commonly employed to describe the opposite of recorded or pre-recorded content, emphasizing the immediate and unedited nature of the experience.

examples.german: Wir leben in einer globalisierten Welt.
examples.english: We live in a globalized world.
The concert will be broadcast live.
